Articles.Content: Will be really cool to add a new building to the KSC, the museum. When you make a great achievement, a new thing appear in the museum, wich describe the mission, the vessel, ect... And maybe, in the Astronaut Complex, when you engage a kerbal, they are a little biography of the kerbonaut.

54 minutes ago, Le Lynx said:

Will be really cool to add a new building to the KSC, the museum. When you make a great achievement, a new thing appear in the museum, wich describe the mission, the vessel, ect... And maybe, in the Astronaut Complex, when you engage a kerbal, they are a little biography of the kerbonaut.

Oo! Oo! Sounds awesome. It could be a biudling and you could go inside of it and see all your crafts. It could show case the first rocket, rockets that diid the firsts, and etc. SOunds like a great idea!
But thhay are no 1.13... I hope will to be thhis in KSP2.
